"The treasure is calling":
"Oh dear, oh dear!
You have helped me to collect various stones
and rocks, but it seems like somehow the
D-Arkers are also collecting them!
Seems like they have been influenced by the
D-Arkers and the colour of the stones and
rocks have changed! That is unforgiveable! Please
take the stones and rocks back from the D-Arker!

*D-Arker drops"

"大変、大変なのっ！
貴方に色んな玉石を集めて貰ったけど
どうやら、ダーカーも集めているみたい！
ダーカーの影響を受けるみたいで
玉石も変色しちゃうんだって！
そんなの許せないよー！
お願い、ダーカーから玉石を取り返して！

※ダーカーがドロップ"
